attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a man 26 years of age has been arrested for hosting a private website that contained links NOT HOSTED but provided links to ileagle content ( this being a very small fraction of the links provided) if this is against the law then why arnt google, youtube, myspace all being shut down ! i know that there is ileagle content on all 3 and not links provided! actual hosted onto the website servers themselfs. This does not seem like the justice system. I ask you to clear the young man who hosted a website of all charges as he has not commited a crime or i Demand you arrest the owners of google, youtube, and myspace.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
